short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download your bookmarks as a plain text file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly Save and Organize: "Download Bookmarks" allows you to quickly and seamlessly download all your Chrome bookmarks as a neatly formatted plain text table. With a single click, your bookmarks, including titles and URLs, are saved to a file, making it easier to share, archive, or migrate to other platforms.

Why Download It?

Simplicity: No more complicated procedures. One click and you have your bookmarks saved.
Efficiency: The plain text format is universally readable, perfect for archiving or sharing with others.
Organization: The downloaded file presents your bookmarks in a clear table format, separating titles from URLs for easy readability.
Whether you're looking to backup your bookmarks, share them with someone, or simply enjoy having a well-organized list, "Download Bookmarks" is the perfect extension for you!
